lead_paragraph: On the main question now before the Senate -- the question whether to change the Neutrality Act a little or to change it very much -- the Gallup survey has something of interest to say this morning. It reports the results of a checkup of opinion on the proposal to amend the law to permit American merchant ships with American crews to carry war supplies direct to Britain.
abstract: ed on Gallup pol and Repub stand
